name: numerica
description: ðŸ”¢ A useful number formatting library for frontend developers.

scripts.lint: eslint src --fix --max-warnings=0 && echo No linting issues found.
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:generate && echo numerica.js.org > docs/CNAME && git add docs && git diff --cached --quiet || (git commit -m "docs: update documentation" && git push)
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run docs:generate && git add . && git commit -m "build: compile ts and generate docs"
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "v%s - patch release" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "v%s - minor release" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "v%s - major release" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:all: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
